404.title: Page not found
404.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

generic.title: Something went wrong
generic.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

api.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
api.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
api.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait a moment.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

AI_LIMIT_REACHED.message: Our service is currently at capacity
AI_LIMIT_REACHED.action: Try again in a few minutes or try a simpler request

NETWORK_TIMEOUT.action: Check your internet connection and try again
NETWORK_TIMEOUT.support: If the problem persists, contact us

RATE_LIMITED.message: Too many requests in a short time
RATE_LIMITED.action: Wait a moment then try again
RATE_LIMITED.support: Our team is here for you

AUTH_FAILED.message: You need to sign in to continue
AUTH_FAILED.action: Sign in to continue building your site

PROVIDER_UNAVAILABLE.message: Service is temporarily down for maintenance
PROVIDER_UNAVAILABLE.action: Try again in a few minutes
PROVIDER_UNAVAILABLE.support: Our team is working on it

INTERNAL_ERROR.action: Try again or try a different request
INTERNAL_ERROR.support: Our team has been notified - contact us for follow-up

AUTH_EXPIRED.message: Your session expired for security reasons
AUTH_EXPIRED.support: Our team is here for you

INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.message: You don't have enough credits for this operation
INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.action: Add credits to continue building your site

BUILD_TIMEOUT.action: Try a simpler request like 'add a contact page'

BUILD_FAILED.message: An error occurred while building your site
BUILD_FAILED.action: Try again - or try a different request
BUILD_FAILED.support: Our team is here to help

INVALID_INPUT.action: Review the data and make sure it's correct

VALIDATION_FAILED.action: Review the highlighted fields and fix them
VALIDATION_FAILED.support: Our team is here for you

AI_LIMIT_REACHED: Our AI service is temporarily at capacity. Please try again in {minutes} minutes.
NETWORK_TIMEOUT: Connection timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.
RATE_LIMITED: Too many requests. Please wait a moment before trying again.
AUTH_FAILED: Authentication required. Please sign in to continue.
PROVIDER_UNAVAILABLE: Our AI service is temporarily unavailable. We're working to restore it quickly.
INTERNAL_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

DOMAIN_SEARCH_FAILED.title: Search Unavailable
DOMAIN_SEARCH_FAILED.message: We couldn't search for domains right now

DOMAIN_UNAVAILABLE.title: Domain Taken
DOMAIN_UNAVAILABLE.message: This domain is already registered by someone else
DOMAIN_UNAVAILABLE.action: Try a different domain name or extension
DOMAIN_UNAVAILABLE.support: We can help you find alternatives

DOMAIN_PURCHASE_FAILED.title: Purchase Failed
DOMAIN_PURCHASE_FAILED.message: We couldn't complete your domain purchase
DOMAIN_PURCHASE_FAILED.action: Check your payment method and try again

DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_PENDING.title: Verifying Domain
DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_PENDING.action: This usually takes a few minutes
DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_PENDING.support: We'll notify you when it's ready

DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_TIMEOUT.title: Verification Taking Long
DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_TIMEOUT.message: Domain verification is taking longer than expected
DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_TIMEOUT.action: Check your DNS settings or wait a bit longer

DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_FAILED.title: Verification Failed
DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_FAILED.message: We couldn't verify your domain ownership
DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_FAILED.action: Check your DNS settings match exactly
DOMAIN_VERIFICATION_FAILED.support: We can help you set this up

DOMAIN_ALREADY_REGISTERED.title: Already Registered
DOMAIN_ALREADY_REGISTERED.message: This domain is already connected to another project
DOMAIN_ALREADY_REGISTERED.action: Use a different domain or remove it from the other project

EMAIL_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.title: Email Limit Reached
EMAIL_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.message: You've reached the maximum emails for this month
EMAIL_QUOTA_EXCEEDED.action: Upgrade your plan for more emails

EMAIL_DOMAIN_NOT_VERIFIED.title: Domain Not Verified
EMAIL_DOMAIN_NOT_VERIFIED.message: Your domain isn't verified for email yet

MAILBOX_CREATE_FAILED.title: Mailbox Creation Failed
MAILBOX_CREATE_FAILED.action: Make sure your domain is verified first

MAILBOX_LIMIT_REACHED.title: Mailbox Limit
MAILBOX_LIMIT_REACHED.message: You've reached the maximum mailboxes for your plan

CMS_CONTENT_TYPE_CREATE_FAILED.title: Couldn't Create Content Type
CMS_CONTENT_TYPE_CREATE_FAILED.message: There was a problem creating your content type
CMS_CONTENT_TYPE_CREATE_FAILED.action: Try again with a different name

CMS_CONTENT_TYPE_NOT_FOUND.title: Content Type Not Found
CMS_CONTENT_TYPE_NOT_FOUND.action: Create it first or check the name

CMS_ENTRY_CREATE_FAILED.title: Couldn't Add Content
CMS_ENTRY_CREATE_FAILED.message: There was a problem adding your content
CMS_ENTRY_CREATE_FAILED.action: Check the required fields and try again

CMS_MEDIA_UPLOAD_FAILED.title: Upload Failed
CMS_MEDIA_UPLOAD_FAILED.action: Check the file and try again

CMS_MEDIA_TOO_LARGE.title: File Too Large
CMS_MEDIA_TOO_LARGE.message: This file exceeds the size limit
CMS_MEDIA_TOO_LARGE.support: Need larger uploads? Upgrade your plan

DEPLOY_R2_UPLOAD_FAILED.title: Upload Problem
DEPLOY_R2_UPLOAD_FAILED.action: We'll retry automatically in a moment

DEPLOY_WORKERS_FAILED.title: Deployment Issue
DEPLOY_WORKERS_FAILED.message: Couldn't deploy your site right now

DEPLOY_DNS_FAILED.title: DNS Problem
DEPLOY_DNS_FAILED.action: Wait a few minutes and try again
DEPLOY_DNS_FAILED.support: We can help you fix this

DEPLOY_CERTIFICATE_PENDING.title: Security Certificate Pending
DEPLOY_CERTIFICATE_PENDING.message: Your SSL certificate is being prepared
DEPLOY_CERTIFICATE_PENDING.action: This usually takes a few minutes

DEPLOY_CERTIFICATE_FAILED.title: Certificate Problem
DEPLOY_CERTIFICATE_FAILED.message: Couldn't set up your security certificate

PAYMENT_FAILED.title: Payment Failed
PAYMENT_FAILED.action: Check your payment details and try again

PAYMENT_METHOD_REQUIRED.title: Payment Method Needed
PAYMENT_METHOD_REQUIRED.message: Add a payment method to continue

PAYMENT_CARD_DECLINED.title: Card Declined
PAYMENT_CARD_DECLINED.action: Try a different card or contact your bank

PAYMENT_3DS_REQUIRED.title: Verification Required
PAYMENT_3DS_REQUIRED.action: Complete the verification in the popup

PROJECT_NOT_FOUND.title: Project Not Found
PROJECT_NOT_FOUND.message: This project doesn't exist or you don't have access
PROJECT_NOT_FOUND.action: Check the URL or go to your dashboard
PROJECT_NOT_FOUND.support: Contact us if you think this is an error

PROJECT_LIMIT_REACHED.title: Project Limit
PROJECT_LIMIT_REACHED.message: You've reached the maximum projects for your plan
PROJECT_LIMIT_REACHED.action: Upgrade your plan for more projects
